expected = {'allow_biz_codes': [40001], 'allow_http_codes': [400]}

    def assert_api_response(resp, expected):
        """
        通用接口断言（Allure / TG / 日志 友好版）
    
        规则：
        - 业务 code 优先
        - HTTP 状态码只兜底
        - 失败只 attach 一次 response_body
        """
    
        body = _safe_response_body(resp)
        biz_json = resp.biz_json or {}
        http_status = getattr(resp, "status_code", None)
    
        logging.info("[HTTP] status=%s", http_status)
    
        # =====================================================
        # 1️⃣ 业务 code 校验（核心）
        # =====================================================
        allow_biz = expected.get("allow_biz_codes")
    
        if isinstance(allow_biz, list) and allow_biz:
            biz_code = _extract_biz_code(biz_json)
    
            if isinstance(biz_code, str) and biz_code.isdigit():
                biz_code = int(biz_code)
    
            biz_msg = _extract_biz_msg(biz_json)
            msg_suffix = f"，msg={biz_msg}" if biz_msg else ""
    
            logging.info(
                "[业务断言] 实际 code=%s | 允许=%s",
                biz_code,
                allow_biz
            )
    
            if biz_code is None:
                _attach_response(body)
                raise AssertionError(
                    f"接口未返回业务code，HTTP={http_status}{msg_suffix}"
                )
    
            if biz_code not in allow_biz:
                _attach_response(body)
>               raise AssertionError(
                    f"接口返回的业务code {biz_code} "
                    f"不在允许范围 {allow_biz} 内"
                    f"{msg_suffix}"
                )
